00040 using System;
00041 using MathNet.Numerics.Properties;
00042 
00043 namespace MathNet.Numerics.RandomSources
00044 {
00052     public class SystemRandomSource :
00053         RandomSource
00054     {
00058         Random _generator;
00059 
00063         int _seed;
00064 
00068         int _bitBuffer;
00069 
00073         int _bitCount;
00074 
00079         public
00080         SystemRandomSource()
00081             : this(Environment.TickCount)
00082         {
00083         }
00084 
00092         public
00093         SystemRandomSource(
00094             int seed
00095             )
00096         {
00097             _seed = Math.Abs(seed);
00098             ResetGenerator();
00099         }
00100 
00104         void
00105         ResetGenerator()
00106         {
00107             // Create a new Random object using the same seed.
00108             _generator = new Random(_seed);
00109 
00110             // Reset helper variables used for generation of random bools.
00111             _bitBuffer = 0;
00112             _bitCount = 0;
00113         }
00114         
00121         public override
00122         int
00123         Next()
00124         {
00125             return _generator.Next();
00126         }
00127 
00142         public override
00143         int
00144         Next(
00145             int maxValue
00146             )
00147         {
00148             return _generator.Next(maxValue);
00149         }
00150 
00170         public override
00171         int
00172         Next(
00173             int minValue,
00174             int maxValue
00175             )
00176         {
00177             return _generator.Next(minValue, maxValue);
00178         }
00179 
00187         public override
00188         double
00189         NextDouble()
00190         {
00191             return _generator.NextDouble();
00192         }
00193 
00208         public override
00209         double
00210         NextDouble(
00211             double maxValue
00212             )
00213         {
00214             if(maxValue < 0)
00215             {
00216                 string message = string.Format(
00217                     Resources.ArgumentOutOfRangeGreaterEqual,
00218                     "maxValue",
00219                     "0.0"
00220                     );
00221 
00222                 throw new ArgumentOutOfRangeException("maxValue", maxValue, message);
00223             }
00224 
00225             return _generator.NextDouble() * maxValue;
00226         }
00227 
00255         public override
00256         double
00257         NextDouble(
00258             double minValue,
00259             double maxValue
00260             )
00261         {
00262             if(minValue > maxValue)
00263             {
00264                 string message = string.Format(
00265                     Resources.ArgumentOutOfRangeGreaterEqual,
00266                     "maxValue",
00267                     "minValue"
00268                     );
00269 
00270                 throw new ArgumentOutOfRangeException("maxValue", maxValue, message);
00271             }
00272 
00273             double range = maxValue - minValue;
00274 
00275             if(range == double.PositiveInfinity)
00276             {
00277                 string message = string.Format(
00278                     Resources.ArgumentRangeLessEqual,
00279                     "minValue",
00280                     "maxValue",
00281                     "Double.MaxValue"
00282                     );
00283 
00284                 throw new ArgumentException(message);
00285             }
00286 
00287             return minValue + _generator.NextDouble() * range;
00288         }
00289 
00297         public override
00298         bool
00299         NextBoolean()
00300         {
00301             if(_bitCount == 0)
00302             {
00303                 // Generate 31 more bits (1 int) and store it for future calls.
00304                 _bitBuffer = _generator.Next();
00305 
00306                 // Reset the bitCount and use rightmost bit of buffer to generate random bool.
00307                 _bitCount = 30;
00308                 return (_bitBuffer & 0x1) == 1;
00309             }
00310 
00311             // Decrease the bitCount and use rightmost bit of shifted buffer to generate random bool.
00312             _bitCount--;
00313             return ((_bitBuffer >>= 1) & 0x1) == 1;
00314         }
00315 
00327         public override
00328         void
00329         NextBytes(
00330             byte[] buffer
00331             )
00332         {
00333             _generator.NextBytes(buffer);
00334         }
00335 
00339         public override
00340         void
00341         Reset()
00342         {
00343             ResetGenerator();
00344         }
00345 
00350         public override bool CanReset
00351         {
00352             get { return true; }
00353         }
00354     }
00355 }
